Goal:
Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity
loss
Targets: Take urgent action to end poaching and trafficking of protected species of flora and fauna and address both demand and supply of illegal wildlife products.
Other Related Major Departments: Forestry  and  Wild Life.
Tentative Indicators: Red List Index for species in trade.

Goal:
Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity
loss
Targets: Take urgent action to end poaching and trafficking of protected species of flora and fauna and address both demand and supply of illegal wildlife products.
Other Related Major Departments: Forestry  and  Wild Life.
Tentative Indicators: Proportion of detected trade in wildlife and wildlife products that is illegal.

Goal:
Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity
loss
Targets: By 2020, introduce measures to prevent the introduction and significantly reduce the impact of invasive alien species on land and water ecosystems and control or eradicate the priority species.
Other Related Major Departments: Forestry  and  Wild Life.
Tentative Indicators: Adoption of national legislation relevant to the prevention or control of invasive alien species.

Goal:
Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity
loss
Targets: By 2020, integrate ecosystem and biodiversity values into national and local planning, development processes, poverty reduction strategies and accounts.
Other Related Major Departments: Forestry  and  Wild Life, Environment and Scientific Technology.
Tentative Indicators: Number of national development plans and processes integrating biodiversity and ecosystem services values.

Goal:
Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity
loss
Targets: Mobilize and significantly increase financial resources from all sources to conserve and sustainably use biodiversity and ecosystems.
Other Related Major Departments:
Forestry  and  Wild
Life, Environment and Scientific Technology.
Tentative Indicators: Official development assistance and public expenditure on conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity and ecosystems.

Goal:
Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity
loss
Targets: Mobilize significant resources from all sources and at all levels to finance sustainable forest management and provide adequate incentives to advance such management, including for conservation and reforestation.
Other Related Major Departments: Forestry  and  Wild Life, Environment and  Scientific Technology.
Tentative Indicators: Forestry official development assistance and forestry foreign direct investment.

Goal:
Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity
loss
Targets: Enhance global support for efforts to combat poaching and trafficking of protected species, including by increasing the capacity of local communities to pursue sustainable livelihood opportunities.
Other Related Major Departments: Forestry  and   Wild Life.
Tentative Indicators: Proportion of detected trade in wildlife and wildlife products that is illegal.

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere.
Other Related Major Departments: Home.
Tentative Indicators: Conflict-related deaths per 100,000 population (disaggregated by age group, sex and cause).

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere.
Other Related Major Departments: Home.
Tentative Indicators: Percentage of the population subjected to physical, psychological or sexual violence in the previous 12 months.

Targets: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere.
Other Related Major Departments: Home.

Targets: End abuse, exploitation, trafficking and all forms of violence against and torture of children.

Targets: End abuse, exploitation, trafficking and all forms of violence against and torture of children.
Other Related Major Departments: Home, Women  and Child Development.

Targets: End abuse, exploitation, trafficking and all forms of violence against and torture of children.
Other Related Major Departments: Home, Women  and Child Development.

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: Promote the rule of law and ensure equal access to justice for all.
Other Related Major Departments: Home.
Tentative Indicators: Percentage of victims of violence in the previous 12 months who reported their victimization to competent authorities or other officially recognized conflict resolution mechanisms (also called crime reporting rate).

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: Promote the rule of law and ensure equal access to justice for all.
Other Related Major Departments: Home.
Tentative Indicators: Unsentenced detainees as a percentage of overall prison population.

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime.
Other Related Major Departments: Home, Excise  and Taxation .
Tentative Indicators: Total value of inward and outward illicit financial flows (in current United States dollars).

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime.
Other Related Major Departments: Home, Excise  and Taxation .
Tentative Indicators: Percentage of seized small arms and light weapons that are recorded and traced, in accordance with international standards and legal instruments.

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms.
Other Related Major Departments: Home.
Tentative Indicators: Percentage of persons who had at least one contact with a public official, who paid a bribe to a public official, or were asked for a bribe by these public officials, in the previous 12 months, disaggregated by age group, sex, region and population group.

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.
Other Related Major Departments: Finance, Treasury  and Accounts, Administrative Reforms.

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.
Other Related Major Departments: Finance, Treasury  and Accounts, Administrative Reforms.
Tentative Indicators: 15.6.2 Proportion of the population satisfied with their last experienceof public services.

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
Other Related Major Departments: Personnel, Elections, Administrative Reforms.

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: By 2030, provide legal identity for all, including birth registration.
Other Related Major Departments:
Health and Family Welfare, Urban Development,
Panchayati Raj.
Tentative Indicators: Percentage of children under 5 whose births have been registered with a civil authority, disaggregated by age.

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.
Other Related Major Departments: Administrative Reforms.
Tentative Indicators: Percentage of RTI cases disposed off.

Goal: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Targets: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.
Other Related Major Departments: Administrative Reforms.
Tentative Indicators: Percentage of Govt. Departments / Organization have all information on their websites.

Goal: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
Targets: Strengthen domestic resource mobilization, including through international support to improve capacity for tax and other revenue collection.
Other Related Major Departments: Finance.
Tentative Indicators: Total government revenue (by source) as a percentage of GDP.

Goal: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
Targets: Adopt and implement investment promotion regimes.
Other Related Major Departments: Finance.
Tentative Indicators: Number of investment policy reforms adopted that incorporate sustainable development objectives or safeguards.

Goal: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
Targets: Enhance cooperation on and access to science, technology and innovation and enhance knowledge-sharing on mutually agreed terms, including through improved coordination among existing mechanisms and through a global technology facilitation mechanism.
Other Related Major Departments: Environment  and Scientific Technology, Information Technology.
Tentative Indicators: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions, by speed.

Goal: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
Targets: Promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies.
Other Related Major Departments: Environment  and Scientific Technology.
Tentative Indicators: Total amount of approved funding to promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies.

Goal: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
Targets: Fully operationalize the technology bank and science, technology and innovation capacity-building mechanism by 2017 and enhance the use of enabling technology, in particular information and communications technology.
Other Related Major Departments: Environment  and Scientific Technology, Information Technology.
Tentative Indicators: Proportion of individuals using the Internet.

Goal: Data, monitoring and accountability
Targets: By 2020, enhance capacity-building support to increase significantly the availability of high-quality, timely and reliable data disaggregated by income, gender, age, race, ethnicity, migratory status, disability, geographic location and other characteristics relevant in national contexts.
Other Related Major Departments: Planning, Finance, Economic and Statistics.
Tentative Indicators: Proportion of sustainable development indicators produced at the state level with full disaggregation when relevant to the target, in accordance with the Fundamental Principles of Official Statistics.

Goal: Data, monitoring and accountability
Targets: By 2030, build on existing initiatives to develop measurements of progress on sustainable development that complement gross domestic product, and support statistical capacity-building.
Other Related Major Departments: Planning, Finance, Economic  and Statistics.
Tentative Indicators: Dollar value of all resources made available to strengthen statistical capacity.

Goal: Data, monitoring and accountability
Targets: By 2030, build on existing initiatives to develop measurements of progress on sustainable development that complement gross domestic product, and support statistical capacity-building.
Other Related Major Departments: Planning, Finance, Economic  and Statistics.
Tentative Indicators: Inclusive Wealth Index.
